text:
<@U5YF3N0QH> *Just 3 weeks left of our pilot programme*
:scream::scream::scream:
With only 3 weeks left of this pilot e-mentoring programme, be sure to make the most out of your E-Mentors!

*This is your chance* to ask all of those _juicy_ questions about work life that you've wanted to know, but couldn't ask before!

:point_right:*Your challenge for this week* is to complete the 1st section of your career plan with your E-Mentors by 5pm Friday. It's a great way to tease out all of the gossip about the workplace by using the question prompts! And - of course - helps you think about the place you belong!

So get to it! :muscle::muscle::muscle:
